title: Cotillion
description: To Kitty Charing, the conditions of her guardian's will were intolerable. She had to marry one of his nephews before she could inherit a farthing of the old man's fortune. And the only nephew she wanted was handsome Jack Westruther. Jack, however, made it quite clear he was not ready for marriage.Anxious to hasten matters, Kitty engineered an engagement to Jack's carefree cousin Freddy, hoping thereby to make Jack jealous. But Freddy turned out to be harder to handle than Kitty anticipated-- and man enough to light the fuse that exploded her carefully laid plans.
author: Georgette Heyer
